instruction.value: Administer 10 mg as bolus dose over 10 minutes, followed by infusion of 45 mg/hour over 2 hours.
Infuse 15 mg loading dose over 2 - 5 minutes, followed by 0.75 mg/kg over 30 minutes (not to exceed 50 mg), then administer 0.5 mg/kg over 60 minutes (not to exceed 35 mg).
Administer 10% of total dose as IV bolus over 2 minutes, followed by remaining dose administered over 60 minutes. Total dose not to exceed 90 mg.
Administer by direct injection, may repeat dose in 15 minutes if no ROSC (return of palpable pulse).
Administer by direct injection into occluded catheter, may repeat dose in 90 minutes if occlusion not cleared.

AdditionalNotes.value: Acute PE / DVT: Administer at rate of 50 mL/hour for 1 mg/mL concentration.
PE induced Cardiac Arrest: Administer at rate of 400 mL/hour for 1 mg/mL concentration
PE induced Cardiac Arrest: Administer at rate of 200 mL/hour for 1 mg/mL concentration
If catheter function restored, aspirate 4 - 5 mL of blood to remove Cathflo and residual clot. Discard aspirate and irrigate catheter with Normal Saline injection.
